headers: To be completed by the group
sample_data: Verify that the user can log in with their wallet

User has a compatible wallet installed (e.g., MetaMask, Rainbow, Trust Wallet,
Coinbase Wallet)

1. Open the application
2. Click "Connect Wallet"
3. Select the desired wallet from the list
4. Approve the connection request in the wallet popup
User is successfully logged in and wallet address is displayed
Verify that the user can log out with their wallet

1. Open the application
2. Click on Icon disconnect

The wallet is  disconnected and 
you can button to connect again.
Verify that a user can certify an email

1. Open the extension on an email page
2. Click "Generate Proof"
3. Select "Email" as content type
4. Add recipient address(es)
5. Confirm the transaction via the wallet
Proof of authenticity is generated and can be put inside the email
Verify that a user can certify a PDF

1. Open the extension
2. Click "Generate Proof of authenticity"
3. Select "PDF" as content type
4. Upload the PDF 
5. Add recipient address(es) if needed
6. Confirm the transaction via the wallet
Proof is generated and returned as string/image to send alongside the document
Verify that a user can certify an image with hidden proof

1. Open the extension
2. Click "Generate Proof of authenticity"
3. Select "Image" as content type
4. Upload the image 
5. Confirm the transaction via the wallet
Proof is generated and returned as string/image to send alongside the document
Verify that a user can certify arbitrary text

1. Open the extension
2. Click "Generate Proof of authenticity"
3. Select "Plain text" as content type
4. Enter or paste the text content
5. Confirm the transaction via the wallet
Proof is generated and returned as string/image to send alongside the document
Confirm that email proofs are correclty validated

1. Open the email in Gmail/Outlook
2. Open the extension
3. Click "Verify Authenticity"
4. Let the extension auto-detect the email content
Authenticity is confirmed with issuer address displayed
Confirm that PDF proofs are correctly validated

1. Open the email in Gmail/Outlook
2. Open the extension
3. Click "Verify Authenticity"
4. Upload the PDF and the proof
5. Start verification
Authenticity is confirmed with issuer address and timestamp
Confirm that image proofs are correctly validated

1. Open the email in Gmail/Outlook
2. Open the extension
3. Click "Verify Authenticity"
4. Upload the image and the proof
5. Start verification
Authenticity is confirmed with issuer address and timestamp
